name: Cien Anos Salamon
additionalNotes: 100 An¯os was originally released in 2004 to celebrate 100 years of Dominican excellence from La Aurora.  This cigar would go on to be the #1 cigar from the Dominican Republic by Cigar Aficionado in '04 and was subsequently re-released in 2012 due to the increased demand from 100 An¯os fans.
